Enable retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to make Dev Assistant’s responses more relevant. We recommend using this setting if your device has more than 8 GB of RAM.
Activate debug logging for Agentforce Vibes extension.
Automatically show inline completion suggestions. The extension must be activated for this setting to be enabled.
Enable or disable Agentforce completions for specified languages
Show an indicator to signal that Agentforce is making an autocomplete request.

Check this setting to disable inline completions when you’re idle to help you save resources. You can always enable inline completions using the alt(⎇)/option(⌥) + \ hotkeys to manually generate autocomplete suggestions. Inline autocomplete will also re-enable automatically after 1 hour of inactivity.
Limit the context window to 65,536 tokens to optimize for data masking compliance.
salesforcedx-einstein-gpt.settings.title: Agentforce Vibes
salesforcedx-einstein-gpt.walkthroughs.e: Your Salesforce AI pair programmer to write faster, better code focusing on LWC and Apex

To get started:

$(project)  [Open a Salesforce DX Project](command:sf.project.generate)

$(plug)  [Connecting to a Salesforce Org](command:sf.set.default.org)

See [Agentforce Vibes documentation](https://developer.salesforce.com/tools/vscode/en/einstein/einstein-overview) to learn more.

This tool uses generative AI, which can produce inaccurate or harmful responses.

$(stop-circle)  [Disable Agentforce Vibes](command:salesforcedx-einstein-gpt.displayStatusMenu)

Agentforce is your context aware coding partner. Just describe what you need and Agentforce picks the right tools, follows your org's rules, and shows you a plan before doing anything.

Start in Plan mode to preview what it wants to do. When you're ready, switch to Act mode to run tools and generate code.

You stay in control at every step.

Let Agentforce do the heavy lifting. Backed by org-aware MCP servers, these tools review, refactor, and build code across your entire stack — beyond the limits of local development tools.

See the [MCP Tools documentation](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/platform/einstein-for-devs/guide/devagent-mcp.html) to learn more.
Use @context to feed Agentforce key files, components, or metadata. With the full picture, it returns more accurate, relevant, and org-aware responses.
Apply custom rules at the workspace or project level. Agentforce applies your rules automatically so every suggestion fits your org's standards without extra lift.

Use AI-based autocomplete to accept suggestions for code as you write it, right inside your editor. These AI-generated code suggestions are context aware and are based on the metadata in your connected org.

Inline autocompletions can be triggered in Apex and LWC (Javascript, HTML and CSS) files.
salesforcedx-einstein-gpt.toggleEinstein: Agentforce: Toggle Auto Completions for Current File Type
